title: Death toll in great earthquakes as of 2016
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Death toll for 10 number of Earthquakes.
The maximum Death toll 242000.0 is found at Earthquake Tangshan (China 1976) and the minimum is found at Muzaffarabad (Pakistan 2005) where Death toll is 73338.0.
There is a difference of 168662.0 between the maximum Earthquake Tangshan (China 1976) and minimum Earthquake Muzaffarabad (Pakistan 2005).

max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Earthquake, and Death toll in each Earthquake on the y axis.
Earthquake Tangshan (China 1976) has the highest Death toll and Muzaffarabad (Pakistan 2005) has the lowest Death toll.
The second highest Death toll is appeared to be the Earthquake .
The difference of Death toll between the highest and lowest Earthquake is 168662.0.
Death toll at Earthquake Tangshan (China 1976) is 242000.0 , second place is  at 242000.0, and thirdly is Nanchang (China 1927) at 200000.0.
The highest value 242000.0 at Tangshan (China 1976) is almost 1.61 times larger than the average value 149909.2.
